Question: The name this person is the Anglicisation of the Latin Christophorus ****.
Hints: The most iconic image of this person is a portrait by Sebastiano del Piombo, which has been reproduced in many textbooks.
On 30 May 1498, this person left with six ships from Sanlúcar, Spain, for his third trip to the New World.
For one year this person and his men remained stranded on Jamaica.
